metadata.title: CVE-2021-26117 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The optional ActiveMQ LDAP login module can be configured to use anonymousaccess to the LDAP server. In this case, for Apache ActiveMQ Artemis priorto version 2.16.0 and Apache ActiveMQ prior to versions 5.16.1 and 5.15.14,the anonymous context is used to verify a valid users password in error,resulting in no check on the password.

criterions.comment: activemq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
